normalised: With reference to the recent article on infrastructural improvements in Indian seaways, it is pertinent to note that the R-o-R-o ferry service between Mumbai and Mandwa has significantly reduced travel time to approximately one hour, down from the previous four hours by road. This development, sanctioned under the Sagarmala project, will enhance connectivity and tourism. Furthermore, proposed upgrades to passenger terminals across coastal cities like Kochi and Chennai, estimated at a cost of rupee two hundred and fifty crore, are slated for completion by Q four two thousand and twenty four, thereby boosting maritime tourism.
